data.message: Y'all are funny with that 'stay out of politics eminem' bs. If you were true fans you would know that he made a whole song bashing Bush in his Encore album. He's also made songs bashing ja rule, *NSYNC, and Fred durst to name a few. This guy is a lyrical genius who sticks up for what he believes in and doesn't give a fuck about what y'all think. Trump is a pos president who is running the country on his own racist money sucking agenda. I am happy to be an Eminem fan 15 years ago, 10 years ago, 5 years ago, and definitely right now. Fuck you donald!

replies.message: Trump supporters telling a celebrity to stay out of politics while supporting a reality show celebrity.  Irony.
It's like they never listened to the actual words.
In interviews he admits to bashing people just because it flows...

Brian Imler Uh-uh. That's not what this is. He didn't do this to be clever, and that is pretty obvious. This whole piece was about one thing. He didn't just sneak in a barb because it flowed. He went after him and told all of his supporters off, and he knows he has a lot of hangers-on who are Trump supporters. This is what it looks like to stand up to racism. He has drawn a line in the sand.
Ya but he never said fuck you to the people that voted for them

His flow sucked. It wasn't entertaining, it was just boring. It was a whiny old white guy complaining that he doesn't always get his way.
His last album tanked, his next album will tank, and then he'll be gone.
